class_notes: This section is for MN Pathway to MSN semester 3 students only.
course_description: This course introduces theories, models, and tools of healthcare improvement science for optimizing quality and patient-centered care. Students explore the evolution of quality care science, integrate data analytics and informatics to improve healthcare quality and safety for patient populations.
sections: Class Nbr: 2488, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 3:30-5:20p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
